item.title: numpy distance

item.description: # coding=utf-8 """ Created on Sun Dec 28 10:33:42 2014 @author: wepon """ # 相似度计算,inA、inB都是行向量 import numpy as np from numpy import linalg as la # 欧式距离 def euclidSimilar(inA, inB): return 1.0 / (1.0 + la.norm(inA - inB)) # 皮尔逊相关系数 def pearsonSimilar(inA , inB):
